title: Install Main Panel (Rough-in)
description: Mount 200A main breaker panel to utility wall. Install weatherhead and meter socket.

title: Drill Studs for Romex (Kitchen)
description: Drill 3/4 inch holes in studs for kitchen counter circuits. Ensure center alignment.

title: Install Outlet Boxes (Living Room)
description: Mount single-gang outlet boxes at 12 inch height throughout living room. Mark circuits.

title: Pull Romex to Panel
description: Run 12/2 and 14/2 Romex from outlet boxes to main panel. Leave 24 inch service loops.

title: Install Mixing Valve (Shower)
description: Solder and mount shower mixing valve. Pressure test connections.

title: DWV Rough-in (Bathroom)
description: Install 3-inch PVC drain line for toilet and 2-inch for sink/shower. Slope 1/4 inch per foot.

title: Install Water Heater
description: Mount and connect tankless water heater. Install shut-off valves and expansion tank.

title: Organize Tool Stall
description: Sort and hang all power tools. Sweep floor and label storage bins.

title: Clean Workshop
description: Sweep floors, organize workbench, dispose of scrap materials properly.

title: Inventory Materials Check
description: Count and log all electrical and plumbing supplies. Update inventory spreadsheet.
